entry.title: Arena of Evolution has reportedly rolled out in more territories

link.title: Arena of Evolution has reportedly rolled out in more territories

entry.summary: Arena of Evolution, the Auto Chess rip-off that soft launched on Android recently, has reportedly rolled out in more territories. It doesn’t seem to be a full global release but players in America and Germany are reporting that it’s available in their countries now. Arena of Evolution is basically Auto Chess on mobile If you haven’t heard of this yet, it’s a new strategy game that draws an awful lot of inspiration from Auto Chess. That’s a Dota spin-off in which you set all of your strategical options before the battle and then watch it play out. It’s pretty novel. There are over 60 heroes to collect here, all of which you can upgrade to increase their power or simply customise their play style. If you’d like to check it out, it’s available in certain territories right now on Google Play. As ever, please let us know in the comments section below if you can or can’t get it so the audience has a good idea of where it’s available.
